subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

PARIS HILTON -- COUNTDOWN TO LOCKDOWN!
Five days and counting until Paris Hilton has to start
serving her prison sentence for violating probation. And
there's word from friends and family that Paris is stressed out
and scared -- what will she face as she gets ready to go behind
bars? The inside story, tonight on TV's most provocative
entertainment news show.

IS HOLLYWOOD ENABLING
LINDSAY LOHAN?
As Lindsay Lohan gets
treated in rehab, the producers of a movie she's set to start
working on say they'll wait for her to get out. Are they giving
her a well-deserved chance to get well, or should Lindsay face
tougher consequences? The provocative questions, tonight on
Showbiz Tonight.

STARS WHO ARE UNLUCKY IN LOVE
Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Jennifer Aniston -- some of
the most beautiful, talented, richest women in the world seem
to have everything going great in their lives -- except their
love lives? What gives? Why are these famous women unlucky in
love?

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Lindsay's second stint in rehab: Will it work this time?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT.
